frontmatter.title: Grafana Operator
frontmatter.subtitle: Operational dashboards for your data with Grafana and Meshery
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: Centralize the analysis, visualization, and alerting for all of your data with Grafana.
Meshery discovers your Grafana servers. Easily import existing Grafana dashboards and panels into Meshery
Integrate your boards and panels and new insights and metrics
